R C Morris Sales located in Elkhart, IN; midwestern USA is one of the BEST kept SECRETS in the WORLDWIDE ELECTRICAL INDUSTRY. Now that we have the ability to let the WORLD COMMUNITY kwow about us, it's now time for you to see how so many individual companies and enterprises have been able to maintain equipment that most would say
"it is time to replace this equipment"

BUT WE at RCM Sales have found that in the great USA not everyone starts at the top, some of us must begin where someone else let off. This means older equipment, hard to find parts, expensive refits, special made to order parts and some times expensive overhauls. That's what got us started. The need for high quaility, low cost eletrical parts. What better way to solve the problem then by recycling. RECYCLING is better than using USED PARTS. It's SIMPLE you can't warranty a used part, you don't know what your getting but with "RECYCLED your getting an almost NEW PART at almost a USED PRICE!!!"..................................................
